alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Iredell; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 8:09PM EDT until August 24 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Southeastern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Southwestern Rowan County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 809 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Kannapolis, or near Mooresville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Kannapolis, Mooresville, China Grove, Landis, Enochville, Coddle Creek Reservoir and Mount Ulla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
